title: Thermo Fisher Scientific Revises 2019 Guidance
text:
By Patrick Thomas

Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (TMO) raised its financial targets for the year on Wednesday.

The lab-equipment company raised the low end of its revenue guidance for its 2019 fiscal year to between $25.34 billion and $25.50 billion from $25.30 billion to $25.50 billion.

The company also increased its adjusted earnings outlook to $12.28 to $12.34 a share, compared with its previous guidance of $12.16 to $12.26 a share.

The company said the outlook reflects stronger operational performance and the benefits of refinancing activities.

Write to Patrick Thomas at patrick.thomas@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 23, 2019 06:33 ET (10:33 GMT)
